summary: Tested two new features: 1) Order strip section placement on homepage (directly below hero), 2) Food item images on menu page using fbgcdn.com CDN. All tests passed successfully.
critical_code_review_comments: One menu item (code 'X': Stir Fried Mixed Vegetables in Extras & Drinks) has no image entry in the IMG map, so no thumbnail is shown for it - this is acceptable/expected behavior since not all items have corresponding CDN images
In Stir Fry section, item code '27' (Sweet & Sour) uses IMG['27_sweet'] as an explicit img property rather than the IMG map lookup - this works fine but is an inconsistency in data structure
context_for_next_testing_agent: Two new features tested and verified: (1) Homepage section order is correct - Hero → Order Strip (Order for Delivery or Collection) → About/Welcome to Charm Thai Restaurant. (2) All menu tabs show food images from fbgcdn.com CDN URLs. All 11 tabs functional (Starters, Noodles, Fried Rice, Stir Fry, Curry, Fish, Vegetarian, Soup, Chef's Special, Kids Menu, Extras & Drinks). Navigation links all work. Contact form is accessible with all fields.
passed_tests: Homepage hero section visible with ORDER NOW and BOOK A TABLE CTAs
Order for Delivery or Collection section appears DIRECTLY BELOW hero section (before About/Welcome section)
Order strip has 3 cards: Order Direct, Uber Eats, Call to Order - all buttons present
Menu page loads with Starters as default active tab
Starters tab shows Thai Prawn Cracker, Sake Gyoza (4), Chicken Satay (4), Prawn Tempura (4) with food images
All 14 starter items show food thumbnails from fbgcdn.com CDN
Noodles tab shows Pad Thai and Khao Soi with images (12 items with images)
Curry tab shows all 4 curry items with images (Kang Keaw Kai, Kang Panang, Kang Massaman, Kang Dang)
All 11 menu tabs present and functional (Starters, Noodles, Fried Rice, Stir Fry, Curry, Fish, Vegetarian, Soup, Chef's Special, Kids Menu, Extras & Drinks)
Extras & Drinks tab: 10 items found, 9 with images
Contact page form accessible with Full Name, Email, Phone, Date, Party Size, Message fields + SEND MESSAGE button
All navigation links work: Home, Menu, Private Dining, What's On, Gallery, Contact
